Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone that shows how two students are communicating over a distance.
The student can illustrate how sound is used to send information across the telephone.
The student can show the materials used in the string telephone, like cups and string.
The student can depict how people rely on such simple devices to communicate over distances.
The student can highlight how the design of the string telephone helps solve the problem of distance communication.
